title: Clubs not showing up
body:
When I press on the clubs tab this is showing up:

 "We ran into an error loading your clubs; try relogging to reload."

I thought they fixed clubs?

replies.body:
We re-enabled clubs, but there were [some hiccups](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) that came with the re-enable. 

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the name of your club and your club tag so we can better track this until we've deployed a fix. Let me know if you have any questions.
____
#Edit 11/2/2016
We no longer need these issues reported via a support ticket. We're working on rolling out a fix as soon as it's ready. Refer to [our post here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) for future updates on this.
Are automated responses support to be the ticket that we receive for this problem?
Not sure what you mean, can you clarify for me?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Tuc2G8En,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-02T22:31:47.527+0000)
>
> Not sure what you mean, can you clarify for me?

"Hey there,

Thank you for submitting this bug report. We are aware of the issue with clubs and are working hard to get it fixed. Unfortunately, I cannot provide any estimate for the completion date at this time. To avoid confusing or disappointing players, we try to only announce these dates when we are sure we can meet the arrival schedule.

I appreciate your patience and understanding regarding this issue, and thank you again for taking time out of your day to send us this report. Please let me know if you have any questions."
-------
I've heard that people other people have gotten ownership of their club back through support.

We're working on rolling out a fix for everyone, so yes, at the moment, those are the type of replies that are being sent out in support tickets. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Tuc2G8En,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-08T21:53:59.104+0000)
>
> We're working on rolling out a fix for everyone, so yes, at the moment, those are the type of replies that are being sent out in support tickets. 
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

Alright, thanks for the response.
Thanks for the reply! I hope the clubs will be working for me after that fix.
